text: Prince Louis isn ’ t even 3 weeks old yet, but do Prince William & Kate Middleton already have babies on the brain once again? A new report claims to have the answer — and you may be surprised! Are Prince William, 35, and Kate Middleton, 36, calling it quits in the baby - making department? The two welcomed their third child, Prince Louis, just last month on April 23, and it seems the royals are perfectly content with their family of five — at least for NOW! William and Kate are also proud parents to son George, 4, and 3 - year - old daughter Charlotte.
